post.author: zmzm

comment.author: 이인석
comment.content: 좋습니다. 일년에 100불정도 회비가 있고 참가하시면 후회없는 시간을 보내실겁니다

post.content:
Is there anyone who was a member of Toastmasters in Toronto or Mississauga?

I am thinking it is a good way to achieve the larger goal of fostering Canadian culture.

I am wondering if it  is good for immigrants.
post.title: Toastmasters
